channel.title: Importing Client Class
channel.description:
I made a Fishing class as adding it into the object packet was a bit difficult. But obviously I have methods in there such as sendMessage and addItem. How can I import these methods without copy pasting them into the Fishing class? Thanks. Also I went ahead and made all of the classes packages. For some reason it won't recognize them though. Like for example I made all classes have at the top:
package Deob_Source.src;
That is where they are all located. Next I added this in the Fishing class. [code]import Deob_Source.src.Client;[/code] Thanks for all of the help.

item.title: Importing Client Class
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
